patch_grow.__comment__: Parameters used by the patch growing program
patch_grow.__comment__1: This is select so as to make the system critically damped
patch_grow.__comment__2: Factor of 1/73.0f was added when changing to single-byte vector field. Divide by spring force constant to make inner loop of Forces faster

patch_add.__comment__: Parameters related to testing patches and adding them to a surface
patch_add.__comment__1: If any points on the current boundary are within this distance of any points in the patch, erase them. Okay to be overzealous.
patch_add.__comment__2: If any points on the boundary to add are within this distance of the current surface, erase them

patch_align.__comment__: Parameters related to the alignment algorithm (align_patchesN.cpp)
patch_align.__comment__1: The minimum distance between a point in one patch and another that will be considered before assessing it as a match
patch_align.__comment__2: The number of point-pair samples that will be take per-patch when looking for transformations
patch_align.__comment__3: The min length line that will be used when looking for transformations
patch_align.__comment__4: The maximum difference in line length tolerated when looking for transformations
patch_align.__comment__5: Minimum number of transforms that must be found for transform and variance to be output
